title: [Large-Scale] Service-Learning Instructional Design for Supporting Individuals with Dementia

context.prior_knowledge: Basic gerontological education and social science theory comprehension, experience in educational program planning
context.additional_context: A practical educational program linked with community dementia service centers for graduate students majoring in social education

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to design and execute educational activities reflecting the cognitive and emotional characteristics of elderly individuals with dementia
Enhancing the ability to develop dementia family support strategies through Problem-Based Learning (PBL)
Based on weekly service/customer interaction experiences (3+ times), learners write reflective journals, incorporate at least two peer feedbacks, and submit a 1,000-character reflective report.

resources: Community Dementia Service Center Collaboration Network
Educational Resource Package for Elderly with Dementia

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
